name: Test Scribe Lorebook
description: A test lorebook in Scribe format

entries.title: Ada's Sunstone
entries.content: Sunstone gems associated with Ada, likely resonating with her Abyssal Heart energies. Used in crafting Runic Amulets or other magical items.

entries.title: Crag-Hoppers
entries.content: Sure-footed mountain ungulates with thick coats and spiraled horns, found in the Dragon's Crown Peaks.
